description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried rice,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Rice,Healthier Easier,Spinach,Mushroom
name: Mushroom Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup baby leaf spinach, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add mushrooms and cook, stirring, for 8 minutes or until tender and liquid from the mushrooms has evaporated. Add spring onion and cook for a further 1 minute. Add spinach and stir for 1 minute or until wilted.
Push mixture to one side of the pan. Add eggs, stir to scramble then mix through the other ingredients.
Add rice and soy sauce and stir to combine. Divide among four bowls and sprinkle with chopped cashews and remaining spinach to serve.
